Education of ALIS ALISYA

♥ ♥

Have you ever cry over endless homeworks? Because the girl named A do! And do you know what happen next? Nothing. Just proceed doing works with tears. Life must go on!!

    Primary School

(Sekolah Kebangsaan Seberang Pasir Mas) Used to be a young student who very dedicated with my academic achievement. I studied hard to achieve my goals and excellent result for my UPSR. For senior year which was on 2013 I'm holding a responsibility as a school librarian and finally received a good result for UPSR eventhough I didn't manage to reach my dream result at that time.

    Secondary School

(Sekolah Menengah Kebangsaan Salor) Being a highschool student is the best thing ever happened in my life. I get to know a lot of new things, new friends and many more. I really enjoy my life as a highschool student the most. My result also turned out good. The picture was taken when I attended to graduation event for SPM on 2019.

    University

(UiTM Machang Cawangan Kelantan) Sad thing happened here. I only managed to meet my classmate on our first sem only due to coronavirus that founded on early 2020. We proceeding our learning through online. This picture has taken right before the first semester break.
